settings.footer_content_left:
BlackTravelBox® hair and skincare products are made for life on the go, with travel friendly packaging and formulations that make packing, carrying (on), and using them simple and easy.

Unbox the beauty of being you.™

Got questions or comments?

Drop us a line: 411@theblacktravelbox.com.

The Black Travel Box, LLC

9888 W Belleview Ave, Denver, CO 80123

settings.title: Be Ready. Be Present. Be You.
settings.subtitle: TSA Friendly Hair & Skincare Made For You.

settings.title: Don't get ready... stay ready
settings.text: We offer luxury lifestyle products that make it easier to just be where you are...wherever you are. Whether you’re headed to the gym or halfway around the world, you should get to choose how you show up. Say goodbye to dinky hotel shampoo bottles and "ashy" lotions, and hello to a self-care routine that gets you.

settings.title: UNBOX THE BEAUTY OF BEING YOU
settings.text: In a world of pre-defined standards and for-all products, where do you find your brand of beauty? Our collection of travel friendly basics caters to your unique needs with natural skin and hair moisturizers that last long, lip balm that really nourishes, and cleanser and conditioner bars that strengthen and promote your natural beauty on-the-go.

settings.title: THE EASIEST WASH & GO ROUTINE
settings.text: Put the GO in your wash & go with hair essentials that are easy to throw in your gym bag or carry on for an effortless wash on-the-go.

settings.title: IRRESISTIBLY RADIANT SKIN
settings.text: Our best selling body balm nourishes, protects, and smells oh so good... so you can show off those legs, shoulders, knees, and toes.

settings.title: Oh, we're just getting started...
settings.subheading: Sign up for articles on beauty and travel, news on our latest products, behind the scenes info, and exclusive events.

settings.content: BlackTravelBox® is a premium clean beauty brand reshaping the industry with innovative products and an unabashed dedication to diversity.

settings.text: Pair text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.testimonial: Include some of your favorite customer quotes and feedback here as social proof, to build credibility and trust for your services and products.
settings.name: John Doe

settings.title: Your headline here
settings.subtitle: This is a short subheading for your banner image

settings.contact_content:
Orion Brown, Founder & CEO
orion@theblacktravelbox.com
or fill in the form:

settings.title: Adventure Awaits...
settings.content: Life is a journey & experience is everything. There’s nothing more or less to it than that when it comes to the way the adventure seeker approaches travel. Hiking in Machu Picchu? Check. Diving in Galapagos? Check. Ziplining in Costa Rica? You’ve done that twice. The things that scare you are the things you’re most excited to do, & you’ve worked out a perfect low maintenance routine with products like Lip & Hair Balm at the center; making sure that nothing stands in the way of your good time!

settings.title: Your perfect vacation: ICELAND!
settings.content:
Have you ever explored a dormant volcano? You can in Iceland.

Thrihnukagigur, a destination dormant volcano in a nation with around 180 volcanoes is just one of the dormant magma chambers you can explore.  Sitting just on the edge of the Laugahraun lava field, it is a glacial paradise. Contemplate the changing environment on the 34 mile Laugavegur hiking trail, or maybe relax those legs in the geothermal springs.

Snorkelling & Scuba Diving in Silfra Fissure is a must. The waters are famous for their crystal-clear visibility (you can usually see up to 100m), dramatic underwater geology & green “troll hair” algae. 

Cruise the countryside in an ATV & explore various icy terrain. Just pick the area you’d most like to see & go! Iceland’s waters are almost tailor made for outdoor activities like white water rafting & whale watching, & the scenery of thousand year old glaciers is nothing short of incredible. 

Iceland is among the top destinations for catching aurora borealis, yet another rare experience to make sure not to miss out on as you take in the nature around you.

settings.title: Your Go To Hairstyle
settings.text:
You may or may not decide to add a little something for length, but regardless, protective styles like braids or locs (natural or faux) are no brainer for you. They last long, they’re relatively low maintenance, & there are nearly endless variations to tailor to your taste & destination. 

They also encourage the hair to grow!

Because they are so time consuming & can also be expensive, you’re likely to keep them up beyond the trip, saving you a little time in your daily routine when it’s time to get back to the grind.

settings.title: Your Perfect Travel partner
settings.text:
Black Travel Box® Hair Balm is amazing for sealing & protecting the hair, holding in moisture in a gulf warmed climate like Iceland’s, or Houston’s for that matter, & it’s also great for relieving itchy scalp, which tends to happen with braids.

Try it today with a special discount:

settings.title: Want more  travel inspo? Check out our  blog!
Culture Awaits!
settings.content: From walking tours, to museums, to ancient artifacts... you’re obsessed with each location’s present connection with the past. You’re enthralled by the temples of Kyoto, the sepulchers of Spain, and the cradle of civilization. You’re well read and familiar with arts & culture in a way that allows you anticipate the destinations that’ll be standout experiences for you in each country. But you’re also open to learn more from the locals than you do from any tourist guidebook, even if you are making sure to pack the appropriate Fodor’s in your carry-on.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT VACATION: GHANA
settings.content:
Accra, Ghana’s capital, is home to various museums, beaches, & the world famous Makola Market.

Get out early to fit each stop into your day, maybe stopping at the market (said to be dominated by women vendors) after a museum trip or two, & before a visit to the beach; a perfect opportunity to engage in local culture & to pick up some necessities for a beach picnic. 

Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park honors President Nkrumah, Ghana’s first democratically elected president, who helped lead the country to independence. Nkrumah’s mausoleum is located within the park & is open to visitors,, along with a museum charting his life.


See stunning treetop views of the Kakum National Park when you take the canopy walkway over the area of the park, a forest that is home to endangered species like forest elephants & the Diana monkey, & where beautiful African grey parrots & hornbills fly freely. 

Learn about the history of the continent, & perhaps of your own people, at history museums like the Cape Coast Castle Museum & the W.E.B Du Bois Memorial Centre for Pan-African Culture. Ghana’s Ashanti people have a complicated & fascinated history. Learn about it at the culturally focused Manhyia Palace Museum in Kumasi, the capital of the Ashanti region in southern Ghana.

Open-air Kejetia Market, stalls sell everything from glass beads to Ashanti sandals. Ghana has various culture centers, in places like Tamale, Kumasi, & Accra, which feature experiences in the form of workshops, traditional dance performances, & even vendor set ups.

settings.title: Your go to style: Natural & Protected
settings.text:
You’ve made sure to pack plenty of products, especially those that condition & moisturize, so that you can spruce up those natural styles you’ve become familiar with over time. Maybe you’ll go with a wash & go, high buns, or a ‘pineapple’ puffs. No matter what you choose you can easily change your mind the next day or even later in the evening. 

To keep your natural texture looking great, plan to wash & go on day one, stretch in a pineapple puff at the top of the head for a couple days, then switch to a high pony, eventually ending with a bun. & be sure to pack your scarf or satin pillowcase!

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER:   Wash & Go Set
settings.text: While our Shampoo Bar uses ingredients like tea tree oil to get your hair clean while keeping your scalp healthy means it, our Conditioner Bar doubles as a perfect leave in & also revives your natural curl pattern.

settings.title: Catching all the views
settings.content:
From the Pyramids of Giza, to the Louvre, & even the location where Game of Thrones was filmed, when you think of where to travel, you think of the places you grew up seeing in books, the places that serve as a backdrop to your favorite stories told through film, the places where it’ll be mandatory to pack a camera. 

Of course, you’ll be camera ready too! You know you’ll be seen while you’re seeing the sites & you come prepared.

settings.title: Your perfect destination... Greece
settings.content:
From beach clubs to architecture (the whitewashed buildings have made more than a couple of appearances on Instagram) Santorini is a favorite among travelers to Greece, and it’s likely to be your favorite too.

Iconic volcano cliffs in the city remind you of its unique position in the world and, for the moment, of yours. Just Google “flying dress photo Greece” for a spectacle of brightly colored and almost sculptural still images of flowing fabric on gorgeous model types.

Ready to be that model type? Of course, you are. So make sure to get your own flying dress photo while in Santorini. Local photography studios provide inclusive packages, so all you have to bring is yourself and your man (if a cameo is your preference), and they take care of everything from makeup to wardrobe.

Deeply historical, and perhaps more importantly, Instagram worthy sites like the Venetian forts of Corfu, the ancient ruins of Athens, and the breathtaking views at the Acropolis of Lindos - a natural citadel which was fortified successively by the Greeks, Romans, Byzantines, Knights of St. John, and Ottomans are perfect for a breathtaking photo op.

Enjoy it, and be brave about asking your fellow travelers to help you get a shot if you’re short on company or a professional.

settings.title: Your go to hairstyle: Senegalese twists
settings.text:
Make an effortless statement with something low maintenance but extremely beautiful, like waist length senegalese twists. Pack a gel of choice & a toothbrush to keep your baby hairs looking like an asset & be sure to bring the right products for keeping the scalp clean & moisturised. 

Senegalese twists can easily be styled in a variety of ways to look great in all your photos, & serving as a protective style that helps with hair growth is always a positive. 

Make sure to wrap them up at night so that they stay as neat as possible for as long as possible.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER:
settings.text: Every trip you take is symbolic of someone’s perfect glow up, so make sure to keep your glow up with our Body Balm. You’ve paid for the dress, the photographer, and the hair. Of course you’re going to make sure to keep your melanated skin at its best with a product rich in naturally moisturizing ingredients like coconut and shea butter oils.

settings.title: The Lux Journey Awaits!
settings.content:
You’ve been bad and bougie way before it was in a cool rap song. It’s a lifestyle. Whatever you paid to put this trip together, everything is topnotch, and that includes you. You’ve put together your quality designer pieces, styled everything perfectly, and brushed up on your conversational French.

You’re ready for late nights out & slow mornings of skin & hair care after coffee & a breakfast cocktail.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT VACATION: France
settings.content:
From regional staples to street food like crepes (Esmerelda near Notre Dame is supposed to be one of the best food cart style locales for the savory or sweet French favorite), to gourmet meals... there’s no such thing as a shortage, or even a challenge, when it comes to having a culinary experience in France.

Shop and be seen on the Champs Elysees, an infamous street lined with stores and cafes that’ll make you wish you’d saved a little more room for new clothes in your suitcase, and budgeted for the same!

Once you’ve seen the luxe and famous sites of Paris, like the Moulin Rouge and the Eiffel Tower, check out the rest of France! Stop by Versailles for a tour of Marie Antoinette’s vacation home, or head out to the French countryside to take a walk through the lavender field in Provence. Both are great opportunities to enjoy the scenery and have your own paparazzi photo shoot, so come dressed to slay!

settings.title: YOUR GO TO HAIRSTYLE: The Blowout
settings.text:
You’re going to a trusted stylist at home prior to boarding any planes, and you’re getting the blowout of your dreams. The one you see when you close your eyes and visualize yourself skipping the line at that exclusive Parisian nightclub, the one that gets your hair ready to blow in the wind while you sit and talk to a French cutie by the Senne. 

You’ll wrap it up at night, and make sure to protect your hair with a satin pillowcase, holding in moisture to keep that hair not only straight, but full of body.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER:
settings.text: The BlackTravelBox® Starter Box comes with everything. You’ll get our mini sized Body and Hair Balms, bars for shampooing and conditioning, and a lip balm always on deck. So if any quick changes are necessary, you’re ready to make them and look your best when you do.

settings.title: Om's the word!
settings.content:
Meditation can happen anywhere, but a dedicated getaway always feels like exactly what you need. Starting your day with a seat & silence on the beach, feeling your center in a steam room or on a massage table, & soaking in a hot spring is your idea of the perfect vacay day, & you deserve it all. 

You’re keeping your hair low maintenance & showing your skin love while hoping you can carry this calm back to work & everyday life.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT VACATION: Bali
settings.content:
Bali is a perfect place to find tranquility and a turn-up. There’s no shortage of yoga studios on the islands, and the same goes for beach clubs. You could spend days in Bali going to a new one of each... maybe you will? 

Modest open air restaurants called warungs and street food from anywhere from food stalls to motorcycles with gas grills attached, are a Balinese staple. These family owned spaces that are generally clean, safe, and effortless to at or from. Authentic dishes can be as cheap as $1 USD, and if you’re a fan of spicy food, you’re in luck!

Visit the coastal town of Padangbai for beaches less littered with tourists and their trash. This is where you want to go to get Instagram worthy shots in spaces that are beautiful both in & out of frame. Whether or not you're the diving and snorkeling type, the clear blue waters are worth traveling for.

settings.title: YOUR GO TO HAIRSTYLE: Braids
settings.text:
Braids are the classic that are here to stay, & low maintenance looks that translate a fabulous style, they’ve always been in the mix; just think of under celebrated 90s fashion icon Brandy as Moesha, or Beyonce in the Destiny’s Child days, Janet in Poetic Justice, and even Dione from Clueless (yes Dione because we are not talking about Stacy Dash).

Just pick the length, thickness, & style (were all loving box braids right now but Rihanna’s red carpet cornrows may be tempting you to try something new), find a braider or stock up on your braiding hair of choice at the local beauty supply & make sure you have sometime on your hands & the skill for the project you’re about to commit to.

Like most styles, you’ll want to protect your hair with a satin cap or a silk pillowcase, invest in an oil or anti-itch spray, & get yourself some gel & a toothbrush if baby hairs are your thing. Videos for refreshing frizzy box braids abound on YouTube, the methodologies are simple & similar enough for you to figure out what works for you after watching a couple.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER: Body Balm
settings.text: Our Body Balm takes your daily moisturizing routine to the next level. Reach for this African shea butter based balm as soon as you leave the shower, add & seal moisture, & hit the beach & the bars with legs, shoulders, & everybit of visible skin poppin. Coconut & mango oils in Body Balm come together to highlight your natural glow & protect your melanin.

settings.title: EAT PRAY LOVing awaits!
settings.content:
Planning around the meal, exploring recommendations from locals met along the way and fellow travelers consulted before the trip, you are the black woman version of Anthony Bourdain. 

For you, the meal is the adventure, and the kind of restaurant you dress up for and have a couple of cocktails at is your version of the club. Best kept secret, hole in the wall, and independently owned are some of your favorite features of a restaurant, pop-up, food truck, or cart. You never miss an opportunity for a great meal, and know that if you’re in Paris you get a baguette from Poilane, and that if you’re in Tuscany you can visit an olive oil resort for massages and meals that feature oils made with olives grown on the grounds. 

Good food, locally food, expertly prepared food, these aren’t just parts of a moment, they are the moment.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT VACATION:  Thailand
settings.content:
The heart of Thailand’s aromatic dishes is the roots, herbs, and spices that grow locally. Look for vendors selling locally grown dried chilies, lemongrass, garlic, ginger, turmeric, galangal, basil, and cinnamon to use in your own recipes or to gift to foodie friends back home.

The internet is overflowing with roundups of cooking schools and courses that can be scheduled and booked by tourists. Taking place in a variety of locales, from traditional Thai homes to open-air kitchens where hungry customers line up to buy foods from vendors at the famous night markets, these courses offer you a foot into the culture that goes beyond the bite to the actual experience of creation.

The world-famous hawker stalls at Bangkok’s night markets inspire love and loyalty from those who have waited hours in long lines, navigated crowded streets, and maybe suffered an occasional stomach ache or disappointment in the name of finding the best in Bangkok. Some notables include Jok Kitchen, a Thai and Chinese food stall with a daily rotating menu, four tables, and a waitlist that can extend up to one month. Polo Fried Chicken, another Michelin starred stall has been a favorite for 50 years. When in doubt (about food or sanitation), go somewhere there are a lot of people eating and where you can see the food being prepared.

Between meals, there’s an abundance of tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins, and ornate temples. Thailand holds history and culture in the very bricks of its surroundings and beyond that, the wellness traditions mean that a relaxing Thai massage or yoga class will be easy to stumble upon or find through a quick Google search of reviews.

settings.title: YOUR GO TO HAIRSTYLE: Wash & Go
settings.text: A wash & go that you can occasionally put into a low bun, a style that is traditional to the culture, quick & easy to put together when you get a routine down, and perfectly low maintenance, is the way to go. Be sure to apply a good leave in after shampooing, and remember that you can make or buy a fuller bun with hair that blends well with your own if you’d like, and keep the whole thing together with your choice of pony tail holder (hair bungees stay perfectly in place without pulling your hair), maybe accessorizing with a locally sourced clip.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER:  Co-Wash Bar
settings.text: After a day of walking through delicious outdoor kitchens, you'll want to savor the memories, not smell them on your pillow. BlackTravelBox’s Co-Wash Bar is an eco friendly option in a TSA friendly size. The botanicals like sunflower, & natural oils & butters like argan & kokum, provide a gentle moisturizing wash that allows you to maintain your natural oils & keeps your hair manageable without putting you through the work of a full wash day.

settings.title: Your Girl's Trip Awaits!
settings.content:
When you get the travel bug there’s only one way you see things going down. It’s time to hit up the group chat and decide on dates and a location for the next girl’s trip!

There’s nothing better than fun with the girls when it comes to discovering a new city or even lounging on a familiar beach. Putting together looks, losing yourselves in laughs, and attempting a healthy mix of doing it for the gram and “you better not post that” will be on the daily agenda.

Staying camera ready and living like you’re in a movie will take a little planning. There’s no leaving your hair to chance, so consider a style that’ll allow you to skip wash day on a short trip, or to keep your natural hair covered under something protective. Moisture will be your other best friend, so you can’t forget our carry on friendly Body and Hair Balms.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT VACATION: Cuba
settings.content:
A lack of imports & something in the saltwater air have meant preservation of beautiful classic cars from the 1930s-1950s, an instagram ready aesthetic memorabilia but also a vehicle (in the most literal sense) for escape. Guided tours exist to allow travelers to experience what usually falls into the hands of the locals through inheritance. 

Experience Cuba’s thoroughly modern art scene at Fabrica Del Arte Cubano, an interdisciplinary art space in a reclaimed cooking oil factory. The building was transformed in 2014 by X Alfonso, a “Cuban rocker” and now hosts screenings, visual exhibitions, and a dance floor filled with party goers like the tourists who know to look beyond Old Havana to cities like Vedado where Fabrica Del Arte Cubano is located.  Accommodations can be made through rental portals such as AirBnB for less than $100 USD, ensuring your  trip to Cuba can come with all the luxuries you need but won't break the bank.

Old Havana is a must. Whether you’re enjoying the cobblestone streets, sun & open air cafes, or welcoming the evening with a drink (try the canchancharas and mojitos, Cubans invented rum after all!) you’ll feel like you went to both another time & place.

settings.title: YOUR GO TO HAIRSTYLE:
settings.text:
Gorgeous goddess locs or an intentional assortment of wigs, (a capsule collection if you will!) are the perfect ways to go.

You’ll make a statement regardless, and both decisions are relatively low maintenance.

Packing is the most important part! A silk scarf will protect both styles and can also be styled to match the island vibes. Celebrity wig stylist Cliff Vmir, who creates pieces for a client list containing names like Cardi B., recommends rolling your wig the way you might roll your luggage, putting a hair net around it, and then putting it into a silk bag to avoid tangles.

settings.title: YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL PARTNER:
settings.text:
Natural, vitamin rich ingredients like jojoba, argan oil, & coconut oil, work together in our Hair Balm to condition, protect, and strengthen hair from the root to the tip. 

Use it to keep your hair nourished under a wig or take care of any itchy scalp issues while your hair is in goddess locs.

settings.title: JOIN THE INSIDERS FAM
settings.subtitle: WHEN YOU BECOME A MEMBER OF BLACKTRAVELBOX INSIDERS, YOU EARN REWARDS TOWARDS FUTURE PURCHASES AND GET ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE PERKS

settings.title: We want to show some love, so we’re making it easy to earn Insider points and reap the rewards!
settings.content:
Step 1.

Create a user account.

Step 2.

Earn rewards by following, sharing or purchasing Black Travel Box™.

Step 3.

Redeem your rewards for $$$ towards future purchases.

settings.title: You'll get Exclusive updates, deals & perks!
Refer a friend and they’ll receive $10 towards their first order.
settings.content: For every friend you refer you’ll also earn 1,000 rewards points ($10) once they make their purchase!

settings.page_quote: Pro Tip: The more friends you refer, the more Insider points you earn!

settings.title: WHEN DO BLACK TRAVEL BOX ITEMS SHIP?
settings.subtitle: We ship out orders within two to three business days of receiving the order. With standard U.S. shipping you should receive your product in 4-6 days.

settings.title: WHAT COUNTRIES DO YOU SHIP TO?
settings.subtitle:
In addition to the USA and Canada, we also ship worldwide to the following countries: Australia

Belgium

Canada

Croatia

Cyprus

Denmark

Estonia

France

Germany

Gibraltar

Hong Kong

Iceland

Indonesia

Israel

Japan

Korea,

Republic of Lithuania

Luxembourg

Netherlands

New Zealand

Poland

Portugal

Singapore

Sweden

Thailand

United Kingdom

settings.title: DO YOU SHIP TO MILITARY ADDRESSES?
settings.subtitle: Thank you for your service! We proudly accept most armed forces addresses, although shipping times may vary. Just follow the regular checkout process and enter your appropriate APO/FPO/DPO address in the shipping section.

settings.title: WHAT'S YOUR RETURNS AND REFUNDS POLICY?
settings.subtitle:
We have a 100% money back guarantee. If you have a change of heart, no problem! Send us back any unused product free of charge within 90 days of receipt for a full refund.

Contact us at"
411@theblacktravelbox.com for assistance in printing out a free return label.

settings.title: WHERE ARE BLACK TRAVEL BOX PRODUCTS MADE?
settings.subtitle: We’re handmade with care in Denver, Colorado.

settings.page_richtext: Every one of our most commonly asked questions is answered below. Can’t find what you’re looking for? Contact us instead!

settings.title: Be Ready. Be Present. Be You.
settings.subtitle: TSA Friendly Hair & Skin Care Made For You

settings.content: BlackTravelBox® is a premium clean beauty brand reshaping the industry with innovative products and an unabashed dedication to diversity.

settings.text:
"Sometimes the best ideas are born from trying to solve your own problems."
Meet The Woman Behind The Beyoncé-Approved Black Travel Box
Travel Noire - February 17, 2021

"Her brand has garnered a lot of attention outside of state lines—including piquing the interest of the Queen Bee herself, Beyoncé. What originally spawned out of a need for many African American women has grown into a brand with global appeal."
How Orion Brown turned a need in the marketplace into a booming beauty business with BlackTravelBox®
Denver Life Magazine - October 23, 2020

"It’s just now that we’re starting to see more Black-owned beauty businesses create worthwhile products in a market infamous for giving a blind-eye to Black beauty."
Black Women Can Slay Their Travel Beauty Routines with Help From BlackTravelBox
303 Magazine - October 06, 2020

"The BlackTravelBox® helps take the stress out of having to search high and low for products that meet your unique beauty demands."
Travel Smart With These Black-Owned Products
Hype Hair - August 04, 2020

"If you are wanting to look your best during your next outing, try products made from BlackTravelBox®."
Denver-Based Clean Beauty For Women of Color
City Lifestyle Denver - July 26, 2020

"Add these TSA-friendly skin, hair, and makeup products to your dopp kit."
15 Travel Beauty Products From Black Owned Brands
Conde Nast Traveler - July 06, 2020

Featured on Beyonce's Curated List of Black Owned Beauty Brands To Shop
Beyonce.com - June 21, 2020

50 Women of Color-Owned Companies to Shop With During The Holiday Season
Walker's Legacy - December 04, 2019

"Aimed at travelers of color, Black Travel Box sells an array of essentials across the face, hair, and bath and body categories."
After Facing Difficulty Finding Beauty Products Abroad, Orion Brown Created Black Travel Box To Help Other Women Of Color Avoid The Same Problem
Beauty Independent - July 11, 2019

"The best part? Not only are Black Travel Box’s items TSA friendly, which makes it the perfect gift for the #teamcarryon jetsetter in your life or for yourself, but you can get them a subscription to the box so that they never have to worry about running out."
This Black-Owned Travel Box Is Perfect For The Woman Who Loves To Glow On The Go
Essence - December 17, 2018

"Perhaps the biggest appeal of the Black Travel Box is the sense of community it provides for black travelers."
THE BLACK TRAVEL BOX PROVIDES TRAVEL SIZE HAIR AND SKIN PRODUCTS FOR PEOPLE OF COLOR
Black Enterprise - November 20, 2018

A Conversation With Black Travel Box Creator Orion Brown
Bronze Magazine - November 04, 2018

Rising stars: 5 new Denver startups that should be on your radar
Built In Colorado - August 14, 2018

"My corporate background in consumer goods marketing and brand management, for the better part of a decade, helped understand all of the layers of being a business manager and brand owner"
The Black Travel Box: A Beauty Industry Game Changer
Cuisine Noir - July 31, 2017

"Seems like this small business may be the answer to all your traveling while black woes, with not only great products but a great design! "
The Black Travel Box Makes Must Have Travel Sized Black Beauty Products
SheUnplugged - June 30, 2018

settings.custom_html:
Orion Brown
Founder & CEO
orion@theblacktravelbox.com
Orion founded The Black Travel Box with the goal to bring natural hair, skin and body products to travelers of color. This line of TSA-friendly products help Black and Afro-Latinx travelers look and feel their best on the road. Prior to The Black Travel Box, she briefly lead brand strategy at Oracle and brand marketing efforts at Hasbro and spent the bulk of her brand career at Kraft Foods where she led key advertising, pricing, portfolio, commercialization, and operations initiatives across six global brands. Her passion for businesses and brands also led her to build a non-profit consultancy where she helps clients strategize and scale their organizations. She's a lover of travel and food, spending much of her free time outside of The Black Travel Box pursuing the best of both.
